title: Transport
description:
1. 📈 Summary: The delivery process is running smoothly with reasonably fast times.

2. 🔍 Observations:
   - On average, it takes about 12.5 minutes from order to when the food is ready for pickup.
   - Once ready, it takes around 6 minutes for a delivery person to pick up the order.
   - The delivery person typically takes about 20 minutes to get the order to the customer.
   - In total, the entire delivery process is approximately 38.5 minutes from order to arrival at the customer's door.

3. ✅ Recommendation: To make the delivery service even quicker, see if there's a way to reduce the pickup time by organizing orders better or scheduling pickup times more efficiently.

title: Ranking
description:
1. 📈 Summary: The business is performing excellently in certain aspects like quick ranking improvement.

2. 🔍 Observations:
   - The average total delivery time is about 38.5 minutes, from order to customer delivery.
   - You had an amazing improvement in ranking, jumping from 26th to 1st in your cuisine category.
   
3. ✅ Recommendation: 🌟 Keep up the good delivery speed, and continue whatever strategies improved your ranking to maintain your top spot!

title: Total Sales
description:
1. 📈 Summary: The business is doing pretty well based on the total earnings.

2. 🔍 Observations:
   - Orders take an average of about 38.5 minutes to be delivered from start to finish.
   - Your service is currently ranked 26th among others in your cuisine.
   
3. ✅ Recommendation: Consider finding ways to speed up delivery times to improve your ranking in your cuisine category.

title: Market Price
description:
1. 📈 Summary: The business is doing quite well but there's always room for improvement in delivery efficiency.

2. 🔍 Observations:
   - On average, it takes just over 38 minutes for a delivery to be completed from order to customer, with the longest part being the pickup to delivery time.
   - You are ranked number 1 in your cuisine category, which is excellent.
   - The total earnings are $338,858.50, a good sign of a strong business model.
   - The pricing details in comparison to the average cuisine price are not available.

3. ✅ Recommendation: Consider finding ways to speed up the pickup to delivery time to improve customer satisfaction even more.
